EmailTemplate.name: Webinar-Ispor-DRE
EmailTemplate.subject: Living Guidelines Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Living Guidelines Webinar: April 27, 2016 at 12:00 pm Pacific, 2:00 pm Central, 3:00 pm Eastern http://growthevidence.com/growth-webinars/ A presentation and discussion by Mike Cheung, Chief Science Officer, KDIGO, and Sandra Zelman Lewis, PhD, Chief Guidelines Officer, Doctor Evidence, co-authors of the recent publication: “Recommendations for kidney disease guideline updating: a report by the KDIGO Methods Committee” Want to learn more about how we are transforming Evidence Based Medicine? SCHEDULE A PERSONAL DEMONSTRATION AT ISPOR 2016
